movies.name: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.desc: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.name: The Godfather
movies.desc: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.name: Soorarai Pottru
movies.desc: Nedumaaran Rajangam "Maara" sets out to make the common man fly and in the process takes on the world's most capital intensive industry and several enemies who stand in his way.

movies.name: The Dark Knight
movies.desc: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

movies.name: The Godfather: Part II
movies.desc: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

movies.name: 12 Angry Men
movies.desc: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

movies.name: Dara iz Jasenovca
movies.desc: Follows the story of a young girl named Dara who is sent to a concentration camp in Croatia during World War 2.

movies.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
movies.desc: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

movies.name: Pulp Fiction
movies.desc: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.name: Schindler's List
movies.desc: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

movies.name: Inception
movies.desc: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

movies.name: Fight Club
movies.desc: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

movies.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.desc: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

movies.name: Forrest Gump
movies.desc: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

movies.name: Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo
movies.desc: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

movies.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
movies.desc: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

movies.name: The Matrix
movies.desc: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

movies.name: Goodfellas
movies.desc: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

movies.name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
movies.desc: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued across the galaxy by Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett.

movies.name: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
movies.desc: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.

movies.name: Gisaengchung
movies.desc: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

movies.name: Drishyam 2
movies.desc: A gripping tale of an investigation and a family which is threatened by it. Will Georgekutty be able to protect his family this time?

movies.name: Interstellar
movies.desc: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.name: Cidade de Deus
movies.desc: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

movies.name: Sen to Chihiro no kamikakushi
movies.desc: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

movies.name: Saving Private Ryan
movies.desc: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

movies.name: The Green Mile
movies.desc: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

movies.name: La vita è bella
movies.desc: When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor, and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

movies.name: Se7en
movies.desc: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

movies.name: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.desc: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

movies.name: Star Wars
movies.desc: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

movies.name: Seppuku
movies.desc: When a ronin requesting seppuku at a feudal lord's palace is told of the brutal suicide of another ronin who previously visited, he reveals how their pasts are intertwined - and in doing so challenges the clan's integrity.

movies.name: Shichinin no samurai
movies.desc: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

movies.name: It's a Wonderful Life
movies.desc: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

movies.name: Ratsasan
movies.desc: A sub-inspector sets out in pursuit of a mysterious serial killer who targets teen school girls and murders them brutally.

movies.name: Whiplash
movies.desc: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

movies.name: The Intouchables
movies.desc: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

movies.name: The Prestige
movies.desc: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

movies.name: The Departed
movies.desc: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

movies.name: The Pianist
movies.desc: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

movies.name: Gladiator
movies.desc: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

movies.name: American History X
movies.desc: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

movies.name: The Usual Suspects
movies.desc: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

movies.name: Léon
movies.desc: Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

movies.name: The Lion King
movies.desc: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

movies.name: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
movies.desc: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son, John Connor, from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

movies.name: Nuovo Cinema Paradiso
movies.desc: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

movies.name: Hotaru no haka
movies.desc: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

movies.name: Back to the Future
movies.desc: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the eccentric scientist Doc Brown.

movies.name: Once Upon a Time in the West
movies.desc: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

movies.name: Psycho
movies.desc: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

movies.name: Pather Panchali
movies.desc: Impoverished priest Harihar Ray, dreaming of a better life for himself and his family, leaves his rural Bengal village in search of work.

movies.name: Rear Window
movies.desc: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

movies.name: Casablanca
movies.desc: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

movies.name: Modern Times
movies.desc: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

movies.name: City Lights
movies.desc: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

movies.name: Hamilton
movies.desc: The real life of one of America's foremost founding fathers and first Secretary of the Treasury, Alexander Hamilton. Captured live on Broadway from the Richard Rodgers Theater with the original Broadway cast.

movies.name: Capharnaüm
movies.desc: While serving a five-year sentence for a violent crime, a 12-year-old boy sues his parents for neglect.

movies.name: Joker
movies.desc: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.

movies.name: Ayla: The Daughter of War
movies.desc: In 1950, amid-st the ravages of the Korean War, Sergeant Süleyman stumbles upon a half-frozen little girl, with no parents and no help in sight. Frantic, scared and on the verge of death, ... See full summary »

movies.name: Vikram Vedha
movies.desc: Vikram, a no-nonsense police officer, accompanied by Simon, his partner, is on the hunt to capture Vedha, a smuggler and a murderer. Vedha tries to change Vikram's life, which leads to a conflict.

movies.name: Kimi no na wa.
movies.desc: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?

movies.name: Dangal
movies.desc: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.

movies.name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
movies.desc: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

movies.name: Avengers: Endgame
movies.desc: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

movies.name: Avengers: Infinity War
movies.desc: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

movies.name: Coco
movies.desc: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

movies.name: Django Unchained
movies.desc: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation-owner in Mississippi.

movies.name: The Dark Knight Rises
movies.desc: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.

movies.name: 3 Idiots
movies.desc: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

movies.name: Taare Zameen Par
movies.desc: An eight-year-old boy is thought to be a lazy trouble-maker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

movies.name: WALL·E
movies.desc: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

movies.name: The Lives of Others
movies.desc: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

movies.name: Oldeuboi
movies.desc: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

movies.name: Memento
movies.desc: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

movies.name: Mononoke-hime
movies.desc: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

movies.name: Once Upon a Time in America
movies.desc: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

movies.name: Raiders of the Lost Ark
movies.desc: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before Adolf Hitler's Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.

movies.name: The Shining
movies.desc: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

movies.name: Apocalypse Now
movies.desc: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

movies.name: Alien
movies.desc: After a space merchant vessel receives an unknown transmission as a distress call, one of the crew is attacked by a mysterious life form and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

movies.name: Tengoku to jigoku
movies.desc: An executive of a shoe company becomes a victim of extortion when his chauffeur's son is kidnapped and held for ransom.

movies.name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
movies.desc: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a War Room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

movies.name: Witness for the Prosecution
movies.desc: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

movies.name: Paths of Glory
movies.desc: After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

movies.name: Sunset Blvd.
movies.desc: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

movies.name: The Great Dictator
movies.desc: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

movies.name: Chhichhore
movies.desc: A tragic incident forces Anirudh, a middle-aged man, to take a trip down memory lane and reminisce his college days along with his friends, who were labelled as losers.

April 6th, 1917. As a regiment assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.

movies.name: Tumbbad
movies.desc: A mythological story about a goddess who created the entire universe. The plot revolves around the consequences when humans build a temple for her first-born.

movies.name: K.G.F: Chapter
movies.desc: In the 1970s, a fierce rebel rises against brutal oppression and becomes the symbol of hope to legions of downtrodden people.

movies.name: Drishyam
movies.desc: A man goes to extreme lengths to save his family from punishment after the family commits an accidental crime.

movies.name: Jagten
movies.desc: A teacher lives a lonely life, all the while struggling over his son's custody. His life slowly gets better as he finds love and receives good news from his son, but his new luck is about to be brutally shattered by an innocent little lie.

movies.name: Jodaeiye Nader az Simin
movies.desc: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.

movies.name: Incendies
movies.desc: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

movies.name: Kimetsu no Yaiba: Mugen Ressha-Hen
movies.desc: After his family was brutally murdered and his sister turned into a demon, Tanjiro Kamado's journey as a demon slayer began. Tanjiro and his comrades embark on a new mission aboard the Mugen Train, on track to despair.

movies.name: The Father
movies.desc: A man refuses all assistance from his daughter as he ages. As he tries to make sense of his changing circumstances, he begins to doubt his loved ones, his own mind and even the fabric of his reality.

movies.name: Babam ve Oglum
movies.desc: The family of a left-wing journalist is torn apart after the military coup of Turkey in 1980.

movies.name: Inglourious Basterds
movies.desc: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

movies.name: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
movies.desc: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.

movies.name: Le fabuleux destin d'Amélie Poulain
movies.desc: Amélie is an innocent and naive girl in Paris with her own sense of justice. She decides to help those around her and, along the way, discovers love.

movies.name: Snatch
movies.desc: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

movies.name: Requiem for a Dream
movies.desc: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

movies.name: American Beauty
movies.desc: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

movies.name: Good Will Hunting
movies.desc: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

movies.name: Bacheha-Ye aseman
movies.desc: After a boy loses his sister's pair of shoes, he goes on a series of adventures in order to find them. When he can't, he tries a new way to "win" a new pair.

movies.name: Toy Story
movies.desc: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

movies.name: Braveheart
movies.desc: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

movies.name: Reservoir Dogs
movies.desc: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

movies.name: Full Metal Jacket
movies.desc: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

movies.name: Idi i smotri
movies.desc: After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

movies.name: Aliens
movies.desc: Fifty-seven years after surviving an apocalyptic attack aboard her space vessel by merciless space creatures, Officer Ripley awakens from hyper-sleep and tries to warn anyone who will listen about the predators.

movies.name: Amadeus
movies.desc: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporaneous composer who was insanely jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.

movies.name: Scarface
movies.desc: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

movies.name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
movies.desc: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy the second Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.

movies.name: Das Boot
movies.desc: The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth and sheer terror.

movies.name: The Sting
movies.desc: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

movies.name: A Clockwork Orange
movies.desc: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

movies.name: 2001: A Space Odyssey
movies.desc: After discovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, mankind sets off on a quest to find its origins with help from intelligent supercomputer H.A.L. 9000.

movies.name: To Kill a Mockingbird
movies.desc: Atticus Finch, a lawyer in the Depression-era South, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his children against prejudice.

movies.name: Lawrence of Arabia
movies.desc: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

movies.name: The Apartment
movies.desc: A man tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.

movies.name: North by Northwest
movies.desc: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies.

movies.name: Vertigo
movies.desc: A former police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with a hauntingly beautiful woman.

movies.name: Singin' in the Rain
movies.desc: A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.

movies.name: Ikiru
movies.desc: A bureaucrat tries to find meaning in his life after he discovers he has terminal cancer.

movies.name: Ladri di biciclette
movies.desc: In post-war Italy, a working-class man's bicycle is stolen. He and his son set out to find it.

movies.name: Double Indemnity
movies.desc: An insurance representative lets himself be talked by a seductive housewife into a murder/insurance fraud scheme that arouses the suspicion of an insurance investigator.

movies.name: Citizen Kane
movies.desc: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance; 'Rosebud'.

movies.name: M - Eine Stadt sucht einen Mörder
movies.desc: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

movies.name: Metropolis
movies.desc: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working-class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

movies.name: The Kid
movies.desc: The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put that relationship in jeopardy.

movies.name: Uri: The Surgical Strike
movies.desc: Indian army special forces execute a covert operation, avenging the killing of fellow army men at their base by a terrorist group.

movies.name: Andhadhun
movies.desc: A series of mysterious events change the life of a blind pianist, who must now report a crime that he should technically know nothing of.

movies.name: Green Book
movies.desc: A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver of an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.

movies.name: Koe no katachi
movies.desc: A young man is ostracized by his classmates after he bullies a deaf girl to the point where she moves away. Years later, he sets off on a path for redemption.

movies.name: Talvar
movies.desc: An experienced investigator confronts several conflicting theories about the perpetrators of a violent double homicide.

movies.name: Baahubali 2: The Conclusion
movies.desc: When Shiva, the son of Bahubali, learns about his heritage, he begins to look for answers. His story is juxtaposed with past events that unfolded in the Mahishmati Kingdom.

movies.name: Klaus
movies.desc: A simple act of kindness always sparks another, even in a frozen, faraway place. When Smeerensburg's new postman, Jesper, befriends toymaker Klaus, their gifts melt an age-old feud and deliver a sleigh full of holiday traditions.

movies.name: Masaan
movies.desc: Along India's Ganges River, four people face prejudice, a strict moral code and a punishing caste system as they confront personal tragedies.

movies.name: Drishyam
movies.desc: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.

movies.name: Queen
movies.desc: A Delhi girl from a traditional family sets out on a solo honeymoon after her marriage gets cancelled.

movies.name: Mandariinid
movies.desc: In 1992, war rages in Abkhazia, a breakaway region of Georgia. An Estonian man Ivo has decided to stay behind and harvest his crops of tangerines. In a bloody conflict at his door, a wounded man is left behind, and Ivo takes him in.

movies.name: Bhaag Milkha Bhaag
movies.desc: The truth behind the ascension of Milkha Singh who was scarred because of the India-Pakistan partition.

movies.name: Gangs of Wasseypur
movies.desc: A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

movies.name: Udaan
movies.desc: Expelled from his school, a 16-year old boy returns home to his abusive and oppressive father.

movies.name: Paan Singh Tomar
movies.desc: The story of Paan Singh Tomar, an Indian athlete and seven-time national steeplechase champion who becomes one of the most feared dacoits in Chambal Valley after his retirement.

movies.name: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
movies.desc: Three friends decide to turn their fantasy vacation into reality after one of their friends gets engaged.

movies.name: El secreto de sus ojos
movies.desc: A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.

movies.name: Shutter Island
movies.desc: In 1954, a U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

movies.name: Up
movies.desc: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

movies.name: Miracle in Cell No. 7
movies.desc: A story of love between a mentally-ill father who was wrongly accused of murder and his lovely six year old daughter. Prison will be their home. Based on the 2013 Korean movie 7-beon-bang-ui seon-mul (2013).

movies.name: Article 15
movies.desc: In the rural heartlands of India, an upright police officer sets out on a crusade against violent caste-based crimes and discrimination.

movies.name: The Wolf of Wall Street
movies.desc: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

movies.name: Chak De! India
movies.desc: Kabir Khan, the coach of the Indian Women's National Hockey Team, dreams of making his all-girls team emerge victorious against all odds.

movies.name: There Will Be Blood
movies.desc: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

movies.name: Pan's Labyrinth
movies.desc: In the Falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.

movies.name: Toy Story 3
movies.desc: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

movies.name: Black
movies.desc: The cathartic tale of a young woman who can't see, hear or talk and the teacher who brings a ray of light into her dark world.

movies.name: Batman Begins
movies.desc: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.

movies.name: Swades: We, the People
movies.desc: A successful Indian scientist returns to an Indian village to take his nanny to America with him and in the process rediscovers his roots.

movies.name: Der Untergang
movies.desc: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.

movies.name: Hauru no ugoku shiro
movies.desc: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

movies.name: A Beautiful Mind
movies.desc: After John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.

movies.name: Hera Pheri
movies.desc: Three unemployed men look for answers to all their money problems - but when their opportunity arrives, will they know what to do with it?

movies.name: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
movies.desc: Eddy persuades his three pals to pool money for a vital poker game against a powerful local mobster, Hatchet Harry. Eddy loses, after which Harry gives him a week to pay back 500,000 pounds.

movies.name: L.A. Confidential
movies.desc: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

movies.name: Eskiya
movies.desc: Baran the Bandit, released from prison after 35 years, searches for vengeance and his lover.

movies.name: Heat
movies.desc: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

movies.name: Casino
movies.desc: A tale of greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two best friends: a mafia enforcer and a casino executive compete against each other over a gambling empire, and over a fast-living and fast-loving socialite.

movies.name: Unforgiven
movies.desc: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan and a young man, The "Schofield Kid."id

movies.name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
movies.desc: In 1938, after his father Professor Henry Jones, Sr. goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Professor Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. finds himself up against Adolf Hitler's Nazis again to stop them from obtaining its powers.

movies.name: Dom za vesanje
movies.desc: In this luminous tale set in the area around Sarajevo and in Italy, Perhan, an engaging young Romany (gypsy) with telekinetic powers, is seduced by the quick-cash world of petty crime, which threatens to destroy him and those he loves.

movies.name: Tonari no Totoro
movies.desc: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

movies.name: Die Hard
movies.desc: An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

movies.name: Ran
movies.desc: In Medieval Japan, an elderly warlord retires, handing over his empire to his three sons. However, he vastly underestimates how the new-found power will corrupt them and cause them to turn on each other...and him.

movies.name: Raging Bull
movies.desc: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.

movies.name: Höstsonaten
movies.desc: A married daughter who longs for her mother's love is visited by the latter, a successful concert pianist.

movies.name: Taxi Driver
movies.desc: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action by attempting to liberate a presidential campaign worker and an underage prostitute.

movies.name: The Message
movies.desc: This epic historical drama chronicles the life and times of Prophet Muhammad and serves as an introduction to early Islamic history.

movies.name: Sholay
movies.desc: After his family is murdered by a notorious and ruthless bandit, a former police officer enlists the services of two outlaws to capture the bandit.

movies.name: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
movies.desc: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

movies.name: Chinatown
movies.desc: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

movies.name: Anand
movies.desc: The story of a terminally ill man who wishes to live life to the fullest before the inevitable occurs, as told by his best friend.

movies.name: Per qualche dollaro in più
movies.desc: Two bounty hunters with the same intentions team up to track down a Western outlaw.

movies.name: The Great Escape
movies.desc: Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.

movies.name: Yôjinbô
movies.desc: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.

movies.name: Judgment at Nuremberg
movies.desc: In 1948, an American court in occupied Germany tries four Nazis judged for war crimes.

movies.name: Some Like It Hot
movies.desc: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

movies.name: Smultronstället
movies.desc: After living a life marked by coldness, an aging professor is forced to confront the emptiness of his existence.

movies.name: Det sjunde inseglet
movies.desc: A man seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.

movies.name: Dial M for Murder
movies.desc: A former tennis player tries to arrange his wife's murder after learning of her affair.

movies.name: Tôkyô monogatari
movies.desc: An old couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city, but receive little attention.

movies.name: Rashômon
movies.desc: The rape of a bride and the murder of her samurai husband are recalled from the perspectives of a bandit, the bride, the samurai's ghost and a woodcutter.

movies.name: All About Eve
movies.desc: A seemingly timid but secretly ruthless ingénue insinuates herself into the lives of an aging Broadway star and her circle of theater friends.

movies.name: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
movies.desc: Two Americans searching for work in Mexico convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

movies.name: To Be or Not to Be
movies.desc: During the Nazi occupation of Poland, an acting troupe becomes embroiled in a Polish soldier's efforts to track down a German spy.

movies.name: The Gold Rush
movies.desc: A prospector goes to the Klondike in search of gold and finds it and more.

movies.name: Sherlock Jr.
movies.desc: A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

movies.name: Portrait de la jeune fille en feu
movies.desc: On an isolated island in Brittany at the end of the eighteenth century, a female painter is obliged to paint a wedding portrait of a young woman.
